summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein confirming that he is the sole member and owner of NES, LLC, a New York limited liability company formed in 1998. The letter serves as a formal acknowledgment of ownership without the need for an Operating Agreement at the time of formation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein confirms his sole ownership of NES, LLC in this correspondence.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is addressed in the letter as the recipient of the confirmation regarding NES, LLC.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member and owner of NES, LLC.
NES, LLC was formed in 1998 as a single member LLC.
An Operating Agreement was not necessary at the time of NES, LLC's formation.
